entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker elements that overlap the top bar cannot be clicked/Top-level Pickers overlap top bar by default #4821
  • [android] ImageButton.CornerRadius operates in DP #4819
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding "No DataContext found for Binding", yet it still works properly #4818
  • [ios] Cant set TabbedPage BarBackgroundColor in iOS 15 #4814
  • [Webview] Solution for JS Bridge #4813
  • The "Value cannot be null" errors are shown on an attempt to build a project with MauiVersion set to a previous value #4812
  • [Webview/Android] blank screen when website have invalid certificate #4811
  • Consider allowing inheritance from the built-in handlers when creating custom controls #4810
  • [Android] TableView doesn't respond to click after first use/navigation #4809
  • Pending code to port from Renderers to Handlers #4808
  • HTML5 video not working on MAUI Blazor App #4807
  • Label MaxLines doesn't work #4805
  • Incorrect Frame behavior on WinUI such as shadow, margin, content position, corner radius, etc. #4804
  • Not rendering FlyoutContentTemplate #4801

Closed

  • The project doesn't know how to run the profile Windows Machine. #4797
  • Renaming all things Native --> Platform #4451
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Spec] Should BorderWidth be converted to Thickness? #2256
  • Multilingual App Toolkit without the nagging Android bug #1780
  • [Bug] Invoking Shapes API throws System.DllNotFoundException on WinUI. #2463
  • Maui.Android debugger is not working correctly Net6 (RC1) #2550
  • [Bug] Enter does not work in the editor #3097
  • [Bug] Date and Time pickers keyboard typing should not work #3131
  • Sometimes Password Entry Throw 'Specified argument was out of the range of valid values' #3834
  • which version will support .NET MAUI for Visual Studio for Mac #4806
  • [Bug] Exception thrown: 'System.TypeLoadException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #2961
  • ToolbarItem is not appearing #4157

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert dp to px when setting ImageButton.CornerRadius #4820
  • [iOS] Implement pending custom WKWebKitDelegate in WebViewHandler #4817
    platform/iOS 🍎, control-webview
  • [Windows] Detect when image failed to load in Windows ImageButton #4816
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button
  • [Android] Update the DatePicker Dialog if the display info changes #4815
    platform/android 🤖, control-datetimepicker

Updated

  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Update ImageHandler and ImageButtonHandler to current conventions #4784
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.WebAuthenticator refactored to interface and singleton #4757
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials.OrientationSensor refactored to interface and singleton #4662
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Geolocation refactored to interface and singleton #4634
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Blazor Android/Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
